snippet: David Cornwell, Ryan Braun’s lawyer, said in a statement that Dino Laurenzi, Jr.’s “attempt to relitigate his conduct is inappropriate.”
abstract: MLB Roundup; lawyer for Milwaukee Brewers left fielder Ryan Braun criticizes drug test collector Dino Laurenzi Jr in wake of Braun's positive test being overturned; other baseball news noted.

byline.original: By KEN BELSON, MICHAEL S. SCHMIDT and TYLER KEPNER

lead_paragraph: David Cornwell, Ryan Braun’s lawyer, said in a statement that Dino Laurenzi, Jr.’s “attempt to relitigate his conduct is inappropriate.”

headline.seo: Braun’s Lawyer Fires Back at Drug Collector, Says Braun Was ‘Properly Vindicated’
headline.main: Braun’s Lawyer Critical of Collector in Drug Test
headline.print_headline: Lawyer for Braun Criticizes Collector in Drug Test
